result.markdown:
---
title: "US Football scores"
---


Most of [usfootballR](https://usfootballr.sportsdataverse.org/reference/index.html) does not work.


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(usfootballR)
```
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
try(load_mls_schedule(2022))
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning in readRDS(con): cannot open URL
'https://raw.githubusercontent.com/saiemgilani/usfootballR-data/master/mls/schedules/rds/mls_schedule_2022.rds':
HTTP status was '404 Not Found'
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr}

```
Warning: Failed to readRDS from
<https://raw.githubusercontent.com/saiemgilani/usfootballR-data/master/mls/schedules/rds/mls_schedule_2022.rds>
```


:::

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
# A tibble: 0 × 0
```


:::
:::
